item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post using Hugo + GitHub only!

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Alex Baker

I’m an IT specialist, infrastructure technician, and lifelong computer tinkerer currently in Virginia. I’ve worked across public sector agencies and private firms, building secure, scalable systems that prioritize automation, reliability, and clarity.

alexbakertech is my personal project space — a place to document, share, and refine the tools and practices I use in my day-to-day technical life. It serves as both a portfolio and a playground.
